name: risk-agent
description: Assesses DeFi portfolio risk using MeTTa symbolic reasoning to provide scores and human-readable explanations.

PortfolioData.description: Receives portfolio data and initiates risk assessment.

portfolio.description: JSON object representing the user's portfolio.

explanation.description: Explanation of the risk score based on MeTTa reasoning.
